class.name: UtilityAIDotProductVector2SearchCriterion
class.brief_description: Scores and filters based the angle the set [member dot_product_vector] has compared to the search space node direction.
class.description: The [Vector2] dot product search criterion can be used to score and filter based the angle the set [member dot_product_vector] has compared to the search space node direction ([code]Vector2(1,0)[/code] rotated by rotation).
